rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with reception desk and storage space.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side for optimal natural light.
Dining area adjacent to living room with access to a small balcony.
Modern kitchen integrated with living space featuring advanced appliances and ample storage.
Two-car garage designed to accommodate vehicles with easy access and dedicated parking spaces.

openings.description: North-facing entrance ensuring a positive Vastu flow.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light and ventilation.
